name: Grandma & The Filters #1
description:
My late grandma Eileen and I got to know each other really well in the last decade of her life. She became "famous" among my friends on social media because she always had the most witty comments (which I shared using my "little black box", as she referred to it). 

She was definitely a character. 

"Grandma & The Filters" is a series of 10 videos (each in editions of 10) all taken on the first day she experienced what phone "filters" are. 

Eileen died last January at the age of 95. I thought this would be a nice way to go back and celebrate her.

15% of any profits made from these will go to Dorothy Ley Hospice in Toronto where my Grandpa John volunteered for many years.
